Text: Update and some advice:These whitening strips really work, they make my teeth look noticeably whiter after just a few uses. However, I’ve had to adjust how I use them because they cause sensitivity and some pain several hours later. For example, if I leave them on for more than 20 minutes, I start feeling sharp sensitivity, especially when I drink water or coffee afterward. Now, I limit my usage time to max 20 mins, and it helps a bit with the discomfort. The results are great, but the sensitivity is a downside. If you have sensitive teeth like me, you might want to be cautious.

Text: recently tried Crest Whitestrips, and I am absolutely thrilled with the results! From the very first use, I noticed a significant difference in the brightness of my smile. These strips are incredibly easy to apply and fit comfortably on my teeth, allowing me to go about my day without any hassle.The whitening process is gentle yet effective. I appreciate that Crest has formulated these strips to minimize sensitivity, which is often a concern with whitening products. After just a few days of consistent use, my teeth looked noticeably whiter, and I received compliments from friends and family about my brighter smile!What I love most about Crest Whitestrips is the convenience they offer. I can use them while doing other activities, whether it’s watching TV, working at my desk, or even cooking. The results are impressive, and I find it hard to believe how much brighter my teeth have become in such a short time.For anyone looking to enhance their smile without spending a fortune at the dentist, I highly recommend Crest Whitestrips. They deliver excellent value and results that truly boost your confidence. If you want a radiant smile that stands out, these are the perfect solution! You won’t be disappointed

Text: I recently tried the Crest 3D Whitestrips Professional Effects, and I couldn’t be happier with the results! After just a few uses, my teeth look noticeably whiter, and I feel more confident than ever.
